document.full_text: neil patrick harris will perform with his co-stars from the new york philharmonic's recent "company" revival, including stephen colbert, christina hendricks and patti lupone at the tony awards.
document.title: another hundred (or so) people: 'company' cast plans a tonys reunion
lines_and_colors: neil patrick harris will perform with his co-stars from the new york philharmonic's recent "company" revival, including stephen colbert, christina hendricks and patti lupone at the tony awards.
